description:
WOLF

is an award winning innovator in the staffing industry and seeking a hands-on, results-driven, Senior Sales Manager to lead our B2B Sales efforts. We are at the forefront of on-demand staffing platforms in the staffing industry and have reached the point where an experienced marketing professional should join the team. The company is venture backed, been in-market for 3 years and driving employment across 45 US states, which is probably more states than you've visited. As part of our mission to launch the next 1,000 talent marketplaces, we are looking for an amazing sales leader to join our growing team.Here's your shot at being part of the leadership team and eventually building your sales/revenue team over the next 18 months.

What You Bring To The Table

Sales is baked into your DNA and you excel at the art ofengagement to driving deals to close andturning Maybe into Take My Money!Ability to engage senior leadership at a company fromVP to CEO or owner and help them realize they need to move their business to a digital platform.You are damn good with presentations, canvas and spreadsheets.A scholar and havestudiedpopular sales techniques and able to banter and train the team onbest tactics or strategies to sell.Own the sales pipeline, yes fully OWN it. Work with the exec team,marketing, and tech teamto maximize it.Been there done that. Yes, everything from building the scripts, sales playbook andprocesses... all things demo, pricing andcontract negotiations.Wear the WOLF flag at industry gigs and conferences, make some friends while closing business too!Know-how on crunchingnumbers to measuring KPIs, discern trends and unearthing the gold mines within opportunitiesPerformance Delivery: You do what you say you will when you say you will do it.Of course ...you are superb with verbal and written communication skills: You are a pro at communicating over Zoom (we do many), phone, email, in-person and maintain excellent relationships with clients at every stage of the sales process.What's the golden pot at the end of this rainbow, you ask?

Make your mark. You have the opportunity to build asales org in a growing startup.A base salary and of course thatcommission you are seeking. B2B SaaS upside!We'll feed you good leads and you have a solid pipeline to start... it's not 100% making cold calls.Healthcare with lots of free, unlimited benefit partners to make sure you are well cared for.Extra Points :Exposure or experience in thestaffing or recruitment industry.Situated in or around Austin, Texas. (BBQs, anyone?So, if you're fueled by passion, wear a cloak of success, and can juggle in a fast pacedstartup scene,

ding ding ding

– we’ve got a winner!Slide into our inbox, and let's make some magic. ????????
